description: This Python module provides application configuration utilities for a backend system, including environment variable handling, default paths, and a Settings class for validation and structured access to configuration parameters.

classes.name: Settings
classes.description: A Pydantic model class that defines and validates application configuration settings loaded from environment variables.

methods.name: _default_db_path
methods.description: Determines the default SQLite database file path based on existing files.

methods.name: load_settings
methods.description: Loads and validates configuration settings from environment variables, applying defaults and handling validation errors.

methods.name: get_settings
methods.description: Returns the cached application settings, loading them if not already loaded.

methods.name: reset_settings_cache
methods.description: Resets the cached settings, primarily for testing purposes.
